name: Change
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change
description:
DNS Change

Represents a request containing additions or deletions or records. Additions and deletions can be done in bulk, in a single atomic transaction, and take effect at the same time in each authoritative DNS server.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
zone.changes.each do |change|
  puts "Change includes #{change.additions.count} additions " \
       "and #{change.additions.count} deletions."
end

methods.name: id
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#id
methods.description: Unique identifier for the resource; defined by the server.

methods.name: additions
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#additions
methods.description: The records added in this change request.

methods.name: deletions
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#deletions
methods.description: The records removed in this change request.

methods.name: status
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#status
methods.description: Status of the operation. Values are "done" and "pending".

methods.name: started_at
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#started_at
methods.description: The time that this operation was started by the server.

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the change with updated status from the DNS service.

methods.name: wait_until_done!
title: Google
Cloud
Dns
Change#wait_until_done!
methods.description: Refreshes the change until the status is done. The delay between refreshes will incrementally increase.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
dns = gcloud.dns
zone = dns.zone "example-com"
change = zone.change 1234567890
change.done? #=> false
change.wait_until_done!
change.done? #=> true
